name: TheCampusHelper
description: A student resource platform featuring resources, academic tools, and a community platform.

developer.name: Ram Charan Narra
developer.headline: Cybersecurity · Digital forensics · Offensive testing
developer.about:
Cybersecurity, with practical exposure to penetration testing and digital forensics.

I care about clean process: evidence handling, clear reporting, and repeatable analysis. I like systems that hold up under pressure.

Currently focused on strengthening fundamentals (defense, forensics, and applied security research).
highlights: Information Security Associate (Internship) at Telangana Cyber Security Bureau
Summer Research Intern at Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad

post.summary: Starting a new position as Information Security Associate at Telangana Cyber Security Bureau

experience.title: Information Security Associate
bullets: Supported digital forensics workflows (evidence handling and structured analysis).
Assisted threat intelligence triage and research.

experience.title: Campus Ambassador of E-Summit
bullets: Represented E-Summit '25 on campus and coordinated participation.

experience.title: Program Intern
bullets: Coordinated campus outreach and operational tasks for hackathon programs.

experience.title: Campus Ambassador
bullets: Led campus outreach and participation drives.

experience.title: Operations Manager
bullets: Managed on-site operations for a 5G/6G hackathon program.
Coordinated stakeholders and handled rapid issue resolution.

experience.title: Summer Research Intern
bullets: Worked on penetration testing exercises and incident response simulations.
Completed hands-on lab capstones in controlled environments.
